name: useless-random-color-buttons
description: A static PWA built with Vanilla JS and Tailwind CSS. Click colored buttons that spawn and pile up, fight visual chaos, and track your performance stats.

scripts.build:static: mkdir -p dist/css dist/js dist/img/manifest && cp src/index.html dist/ && cp src/favicon.ico dist/ && cp src/sw.js dist/ && cp src/site.webmanifest dist/ && cp -r src/img/manifest dist/img/
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build:static && npm run build:js && npm run build:css && npm run build:minify-html
scripts.dev: npm run clean && npm run build:static && npm run build:js && npm run build:css && (npm run dev:static & npm run dev:js & npm run dev:css & npm run dev:serve)
